coref: A Wolf had been hurt in a fight with a Bear. A Wolf was unable to move and could not satisfy A Wolf hunger and thirst. A Sheep passed by near A Wolf hiding place, and A Wolf A Wolf called to A Wolf. Please fetch me a drink of water, A Wolf begged, that might give me strength enough so I can get me some solid food. Solid food!, said Sheep. That means me, I suppose. If I should bring you a drink, it would only serve to wash me down your throat. Don't talk to me about a drink!
